definition: lit. what the heart wishes, the hand accomplishes (idiom) skilled at the job/entirely in one's element/going smoothly and easily
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
surname Ying
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Rolling code for anti-lost its ultra-thin compact allows you to ease, handy.
sentences.chinese: 滚动码防丢器其小巧超薄让您轻松自如，得心应手。

sentences.english: He paints landscapes with great facility.
sentences.chinese: 他画起山水画儿来得心应手。

sentences.english: But what makes good TV doesn't necessarily make for good teaching.
sentences.chinese: 然而做纪录片得心应手不代表必然能教课左右逢源。

sentences.english: This set of multifunction tools can Be used for house-work with efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 多功能组合工具，家用劳作得心应手。

sentences.english: The knowledge gained only makes you more capable in the future.
sentences.chinese: 将来，学到的知识只会让人更得心应手。

sentences.english: This is a handy feature for two reasons.
sentences.chinese: 这个特性十分得心应手，原因有两个。

sentences.english: It has significantly more functionality and handles server integration really well. If you browse the SmartClient  forums, a few things become quickly apparent
sentences.chinese: 它显然功能更强且处理服务器集成得心应手。

sentences.english: And obviously, going to something early, you have the ability to shape it.
sentences.chinese: 显而易见，早作打算，你将更加得心应手。

sentences.english: One felt that Murrow finally come into his own in Washington.
sentences.chinese: 人们认为，默罗终于在华盛顿干得得心应手了。

sentences.english: I admire her smoothness in Mathmatics very much and I am not exaggerating.
sentences.chinese: 毫不夸张地说，我很佩服她在数学方面的得心应手。

sentences.english: Stepping outside of your comfort zone will put things into perspective from an angle you can’t grasp now.
sentences.chinese: 离开你得心应手的领域将使你换个新角度看待事情。

definition: handling a butcher's cleaver with ease (idiom); to do sth skillfully and easily
lit. an easy drive on a familiar path (idiom); fig. experience makes progress easy/a task that is so familiar one can do it with one's hand tied behind one's back
skillful/proficient
like a fish back in water (idiom); glad to be back in one's proper surroundings
to handle/convenient
practiced/proficient/skilled/skillful
to handle matters with ease (idiom)/to hold one's own
to be successful in every endeavor
to have a fluent command of (idiom)
lit. like a tiger that has grown wings/with redoubled power (idiom)
adept/skilled
lit. to stretch a hand and grab it (idiom)/fig. easy to do
half the work, twice the effect (idiom); the right approach saves effort and leads to better results/a stitch in time saves nine
to reach perfection (idiom); a superb artistic achievement
lit. the stove fire has turned bright green (allusion to Daoist alchemy) (idiom)/fig. (of an art, a technique etc) brought to the point of perfection
to follow one's heart's desires/to do as one pleases (idiom)
